Package prj1.TXTEditor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Converter
    Class that converts the tuples to bytes array and reverse
    discCommunicationAccess
    Class that provides communication from/to the disk(writes and reads from the disk by converting bytes to tuples and reverse)
    DLLnode
    Implementation of a double linked list's node, represents a line of a file
    DoubleLinkedList
    Implementation of a double linked list and all of its functions
    MyMain
    Class that contains main method, runnable class, contains the control panel
    StandardInputRead
    It reads input from the standard input hiding from the user the usage of java.io package classes
    Tuple
    Implementation of a tuple(the word and the line that it is written)
